title: Beautiful Bedroom! Hurry up! Never miss it!
posting_body: Beautiful affordable 1BD for rent.
Suitable for one college student or young working professional.
House conditions:
Large windows full of Bright light.
Hardwood floors.
Kitchen appliances: microwave, refrigerator, gas range, large sink and cabinets.
Washer/Dryer usage in the garage
High speed Internet with private, isolated WiFi Network
Nearby amenities:
CCSF(City College of San Francisco), SFSU(San Francisco State University)
Stonestown Shopping Center, Ocean Ave. with dining and entertainment spots
Transportation:
Mini bus line 54 (half block away) and metro line M(two blocks away)
10-minute walk to Balboa Park Muni/Bart Station, which takes you less than 15 minutes to get to SF downtown by BART
Easy access to highway I-280 and US-101
Requirements:
$1050 security deposit and first month rent
No pets.
No smoking.
No overnight guests.
No loud noise and parties.
At least 6 months lease is required.
Need clean, quiet and trouble-free person
Proof of fully COVID-19 vaccination record.
Contact: Brian
